about_the_game:
You can download free DLC.
The game features DLC which allows you to have additional contents.



This game is a game where you play a tag and escape.

Description of the main features and content of the game:
1. Move the main character with the direction key.
2. At the event, you can enjoy the character's H event.
3. It gets faster and harder, but you can succeed.

* All the characters in this are over 18 years of age.


[About the gameplay and features]
The game is a tag game that escapes from a woman for 30 seconds.
Move around the room and escape. Use tables and walls.
You can run with shift keyboard.
You can also operate with the mouse.
The speed of chasing becomes faster little by little.
The tracking feature makes it difficult to escape.
Win and see the event.
It's difficult, but it's a game you can win.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.
A scene where  woman take off clothes is a game event.
No sexual violence / disagreement sex, drug / alcohol abuse, and self-harm.

name: Hentai Girl Seek

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: You can't escape from me! I'm going to get you!
